# Clair Obscur is the big winner at 2025’s Golden Joystick Awards
11.20.2025
By Craig Pearson
We’re in awards season, and the[Golden Joystick Awards 2025](https://www.futureevents.uk/goldenjoystickawards2025/home)winners have been revealed. Wonderful action RPG*Clair Obscur: Expedition 33*scooped up seven awards, including Best Storytelling, Best Visual Design, and the Ultimate Game of the Year.
Other winners included*Blue Prince*for Best Indie Game,*PEAK*for the Best Multiplayer Game,*Ghost of Yotei*collecting the Best Console Game, and*Hollow Knight: Silksong*picking up the Best PC Game.
Maggie Robertson, aka*Resident Evil’s*towering Lady Dimitrescu, was

search_results.title: My Official 2025 Game Awards Nominee Predictions
search_results.text:
# My Official 2025 Game Awards Nominee Predictions

[Nov 7, 2025](https://bignerdgaming.com/2025/11/07/my-official-2025-game-awards-nominee-predictions/)

—

by

[Westen](https://bignerdgaming.com/author/bignerdgamingtakes/)

in [Ranks](https://bignerdgaming.com/category/ranks/), [Takes](https://bignerdgaming.com/category/takes/)

_If you want to hear me talk about these predictions, check out [The Big Nerd Gaming Podcast](https://youtu.be/-5TgzqXIKFo?si=bTQ5svb1D3SSG1VA)._

As my friend AndresPlays says, we have reached the time of year when I grow the most powerful.

All year, I’m cataloguing the games I play, and tracking many games for how good they are in very specific ways with all of my lists. When I reach the end of the year, I feel like I have a lot of useful information at my disposal, especially when it comes to The Game Awards.

Welcome to Year 2 of BigNerdGaming’s Game Awards coverage. [I did my “way too early” predictions in June](https://bignerdgaming.com/2025/06/12/my-w

metadata.title: Which game will win the 2025 Game of the Year Award?
metadata.description:
The [Game Awards](https://thegameawards.com/) is an awards ceremony dedicated to honoring achievements within the video game industry. Created in 2014, the ceremony is presented every year and features both awards and information from the industry such as announcements of upcoming games.

The [Game of the Year Award](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/The_Game_Award_for_Game_of_the_Year), is considered among the most prestigious awards in the industry and is given to the game judged to provide the best experience both technically and creatively.

Nominations for the award are first provided by video game outlets and websites, before being narrowed down to a final list of contenders during mid-November. The final winner is then decided by a mix of a 90% jury vote and a 10% public vote, before being announced at the yearly ceremony during December.

`{"format":"metac_reveal_and_close_in_period","info":{"post_id":40739,"question_id":40373}}`
metadata.resolution_criteria: This question will resolve as the winner of the Game of the Year award at the [2025 Game Awards](https://thegameawards.com/).
metadata.fine_print: The Game Awards ceremony is [currently scheduled](https://thegameawards.com/watch) for December 11, 2025. If the winner is not announced before January 1, 2026, this question will be **annulled**.
